name: Aarong Dairy Paneer
description:
Paneer is a fresh, creamy, normally unsalted cheese. It is made by curdling hot milk using lemon juice, citric acid or vinegar. The result is a soft, fluffy cheese that is firm and can be cut into slices, pieces or blocks as required but doesn’t crumble easily. The texture is firm and has the ability to retain its shape for a long time, even when it’s cooked or baked over high heat.  CATEGORIES: PONIR, CHEESE.

name: Ultra Mozzarella Cheese
description:
Ultra Mozzarella Cheese is a high-quality, creamy cheese ideal for various culinary applications. Known for its excellent melting properties and stretchy texture, it is perfect for enhancing the flavor and presentation of dishes like pizzas, pastas, and baked items. This cheese is rich in calcium and protein, making it both delicious and nutritious. Ingredients: Milk,Cheese Cultures,Salt,Microbial Enzymes,Preservatives (optional). Uses: Pizza Topping, Pasta Dishes, Baking:Salads, Snacking.  Benefits: Nutritional Value: High in calcium, protein, and essential vitamins.Melting Quality: Offers a smooth and stretchy consistency when melted.Versatile: Complements various cuisines and recipes.Rich Taste: Adds a creamy, slightly tangy flavor to dishes. Storage Instructions:Refrigeration Required: Store at 2°C to 5°C to maintain freshness.Airtight Seal: Ensure the packaging is tightly sealed after use to prevent drying.Shelf Life: Consume before the expiration date mentioned on the pack.Freezing Option: Can be frozen for longer storage, though this might slightly alter texture.

name: Arla Burger Slice Cheddar Cheese
description:
Cheese is a dairy product, derived from milk and produced in a wide range of flavors, textures, and forms by coagulation of the milk protein casein. It comprises proteins and fat from milk, usually the milk of cows, buffalo, goats, or sheep

name: Orgin Mozzarella Cheese
description:
The Orgin Mozzarella Cheese 200g is a creamy and mild cheese, crafted using A2 milk from pasture-raised Guernsey cows. It is produced in collaboration with Haystack Mountain Creamery, known for its soft-ripened cheeses, offering a delicate flavor and excellent stretchability when melted.Ingredients: The cheese typically includes milk, salt, lactic acid culture, and rennet.Storage: To maintain freshness, store the mozzarella in the refrigerator between 2–8°C.Usage: Mozzarella is highly versatile, perfect for pizza, pasta dishes, or simply enjoyed fresh with salads. It can be shredded, sliced, or even enjoyed as a snack.This cheese is produced in the United States, sourced from A2 milk, which is touted for being easier to digest compared to standard A1 milk.

name: Arla Sandwich Slice Cheese
description:
Give your sandwiches a boost – slide the Arla Sandwiches Slices in for that epic upgrade! Arla Sandwich Slices are a delightful blend of vegetable fat and cheese (24% fat); it is great to use with all types of bread and melt wonderfully on toast. Enjoy the richness of protein and calcium in the soft texture of every slice, wrapped conveniently in individual packages. No matter the type of sandwich you choose to make, each slice is a guaranteed cheesy delight. Storage Information: Refrigerate between 2-8°C.Ingredients: Cheese (49%, water, butter, skimmed milk powder, emulsifying salts (E452, E341), milk protein, salt, acidity regulator (E500), preservative (E200)

name: Grand'Or Camembert
description:
Grand’Or, a Unilac Holland BV trademark, represent the most refined cheese and dairy products Europe has to offer. Made from the best milk and selected with the utmost care, this selection truly upholds its name: Grand’Or. Grand’Or is the leading dairy brand that stands for European quality and extraordinary enjoyment. You can smell it. You can see it. You can taste it. Grand’Or found its origins in the Netherlands, a country of endless green pastures, dairy cows, goats, and sheep. Cheese has been made in the Netherlands since prehistoric times, and you can definitely taste it. For many centuries, the Netherlands has been one of the largest cheese exporters in Europe. We continue this long-lived tradition with our quality brand Grand’Or. Only carefully selected quality-cheeses from across Europe deserve the Grand’Or label: including the world-famous Dutch cheeses, Edam and Gouda; the popular Cheddar in England; the special Emmental cheese; or the Southern European-original Mozzarella. Grand’or is now available worldwide through our network of partners. Product Summary:High-quality Camembert cheese known for its creamy texture and distinct flavourOffers a velvety and creamy texture that melts in the mouthPerfect for cheese boards, sandwiches, salads, and various culinary creationsCrafted without the use of preservatives for a more natural cheese experiencePerfect for pairing with fruits, nuts, and a variety of accompaniments Brand : Grand'OrPack Size : 125 gType : Feta & White Cheese.
